original_text: This is what a leader in the church must be like. Nobody should have a reason to say that he has done something wrong. He must be the husband of only one wife. He must have children who respect him. Nobody should say that they enjoy bad things or that they do not obey their parents.
korean_text: 책망할 것이 없고 한 아내의 남편이며 방탕하다는 비난을 받거나 불순종하는 일이 없는 믿는 자녀를 둔 자라야 할지라

sentences.original_text: This is what a leader in the church must be like
Nobody should have a reason to say
that he has done something wrong
He must be the husband of only one wife
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 한 명의 아내만을 둔 남편이어야 합니다

sentences.original_text: He must have children who respect him
Nobody should say that they enjoy bad things
sentences.korean_translation: 아무도 나쁜 것을 즐긴다고 말해서는 안 됩니다

sentences.original_text: or that they do not obey their parents
